page.title: 14CHADDESLEY CORBETT W.I.
page.content: The fisrt Wednesday in every month about 50 ladies meet in the village hall. They come from all walks of life, range in age from 16 to 80, are of varying religious beliefs and politics, . Over a period of 12 months the meetings will cover a variety of topics; Self-Defence, Growing Herbs, Travel, Conservation, Refugees in the Sudan. Under the Presidency of Rosabelle Needham, the meetings run in a happy and relaxed atmosphere giving the opportunity to mix freely. Off shoots of the main meeting are a Drama group, Art classes, Dressmaking, and special events that husbands and families join in, this August an Hawaiian evening in members garden. The W.I. enriches village life. Newcomers moving in, join, seeing it as the ideal way to meet people and make friends, and they're right!
